description: Birchbox is one of the original beauty sample subscription boxes. Each box costs $10 a month, or you can sign up for an annual subscription ($110) and get one month free. Boxes typically include a variety of samples, deluxe size samples, and the occasional full size product.

Barkbox is a monthly subscription box for dogs. Every month they send your pup a package full of toys and healthy and nutritious treats based on your dog's size. Sign up for a 6 month subscription for major savings - only $19 a month!

Kiwi Crate sends your child monthly crates filled with materials and inspiration to encourage creativity and curiosity. Projects cover a number of developmental areas through art, science, imaginative play.

This box was designed with the specific goal of weight loss in mind. Each box contains 4 to 5 premium weight loss items such as vitamin and supplement samples, fitness gear and healthy eating tools. Discover products to help you succeed with weight loss.
Blue Apron is a meal delivery service. Every week they send you recipes and fresh ingredients to make 3 different meals. For 3 meals for two people, the subscription is $59.94 a week.

Healthy surprise is a monthly healthy snack subscription service. All of their snacks are vegan, and free of gluten, dairy, corn, and soy. The starter snack box is $33 a month plus $6.99 shipping. Shipping to Canada is $9.99 for the starter box. (Worldwide shipping fees vary).
BlushBox is dedicated to helping women embrace their sexy side in a classy, fun and stylish way. Each BlushBox is filled with fashionable intimates, bedroom accessories and beauty products.

Golden tote is a surprise shopping spree bundled up in a cute, canvas tote bag and delivered to your door without doing any of the work. It's a great assortment of ready-to-wear clothing and accessories that we personally curate just for you. Select one or two items, and the Golden Tote stylists surprise you with the rest of the items. There are two pricing options: $49 for two items worth up to $250 (you pick one item), or $149 for 6-7 items worth up to $600 (you pick two items). Flat rate ground shipping to the continental US $7.95. AK HI $15 and international is $25. This is not a traditional subscription - new boxes are available each month - buy if you are interested.

Stitch Fix is a personal styling service. You tell them your style and size preferences, and they send you a package of stylish goodies to try on at home. No two Fix shipments are alike. Each one is hand-picked just for you. Keep what items you like, and return the rest in a pre-paid return mailer. The services costs $20 a month for your stylist, but that fee is deducted from any items you choose to keep.

POPSUGAR Must Have is a monthly lifestyle subscription box curated by the editors at POPSUGAR. Each box features their "must have" products for beauty, fashion, home, food, fitness and more. Every box has a value of $100+!
Love With Food helps you discover new organic, all-natural snacks delivered to your door every month. The Tasting box sends 8+ new & surprise snacks each month

Julep Maven is a nail polish and beauty subscription service. Each month you can choose one of five boxes, skip that month, or upgrade to the entire collection of beauty and nail polish products for an additional $30.
Bespoke Post is a high-quality men's subscription box service. Each month they curate 1-3 new boxes around a theme, and you can select which one you want, or skip that month.

Plated is a weekly meal subscription service. Each week you can select which recipes you want and they ship you everything you need to make the meal for 2, 4 or 6 people. If you're not interested in the meal offerings any week, you can skip the week in your account section.

Pre-made and packaged meals delivered weekly! They use natural and organic ingredients, no added sugars or sweeteners, and all their meals are made in a gluten-free facility. (You can also get most meals with or without cheese), and they have vegan and vegetarian options as well. They are currently only shipping on the west coast but they will be expanding soon. Use coupon code FRESH50 to save 50% off your first box.

Our monthly crate allows you to discover and eat 5-6 full-size, super premium foods from around America, with little commitment. The food & beverage items that you'll receive in your Mantry are not your typical grocery store varieties. Led by the hand of amazing Artisan makers, these foods are painstakingly sourced and lovingly crafted into the perfect original theme (i.e. Bourbon Breakfast, Hecho en America).

The Little Lace Box is a monthly subscription for women that features a new product created by an up-and-coming designer sent to your door every month: a special fashion accessory for you or your home. Also included youâ€™ll find a selection of name brand and boutique brand beauty, lifestyle, and home product samples and discounts exclusively for the fashion maven inside every woman. Save 20% per month by purchasing an annual subscription.
Birchbox Man is a monthly grooming and lifestyle subscription box service for men. Each box includes a mix of lifestyle items (wallets, socks, belts, etc), and grooming product samples.

Bulu Box is a vitamin and supplement sample box. Each box includes a sampling of vitamins and supplements that help in all areas of health. Each box contains 4 to 5 premium samples plus lifestyle extras from time to time.

Every month you and your child will get a box of 4-5 items. These best-of products are recommended and reviewed by real moms and are tailored to the age of your child, from newborn up to 5 years. Each month, youâ€™ll discover and enjoy a surprise selection of some of our favorite finds, including toys, books, snacks, household products, as well as other goodies for kids and even parents. (Boxes are only $21 a month with a 6-month subscription).

FabFitFun is a quarterly subscription service that sends you the latest in beauty and fashion, fitness, and wellness every season. The box is curated by Guilana Rancic and the FabFitFun team, and each season is guaranteed to have $120+ worth of full sized product!

Every crate is chock-full of play-and-learn activities that engage the natural curiosity and creativity of preschoolers, plus imagine! magazine, created in partnership with Highlights for Children. Get a fresh, engaging new theme each monthâ€”from exploring colors to going on a safari, and everything in between!
Doodle Crate inspires young makers to learn new skills and gain creative confidence. Every month, a new super-fun DIY project that kids will love to design and create.

Tinker Crate inspires kids to explore and learn about science, engineering, and technologyâ€”and have fun doing it. Every month, a new crate to help kids develop a tinkering mindset and creative problem solving skills.
Club W recommends wines to you based on your profile. Each month you get 3 wines of your choice for $39 plus $6 shipping. You can always add more wine or skip a month.

Each month, Hamptons Lane curates amazing kitchen products together with artisan foods & ingredients into a themed box, like the Must-Haves of Cucina Mexicana or The Best in BBQ. On the first of the month, they reveal the box for you to take a peek at and decide whether you would like to receive it -- no charge for the boxes you skip.

Nerd Block is a monthly subscription box for toys, collectibles, t-shirts and other "geeky" things. Every Nerd Block comes with a custom t-shirt (in your size) and 5-6 epic items for you to tear into! The box costs $19.99 plus shipping (Shipping is $8.75 to Canada, $9.50 to US, $12.50 Worldwide)

GlobeIn delivers â€œthe globe in a boxâ€ - a themed collection of 5 to 7 artisan-made products from around the world. Each box includes stories on the country of origin and the artisan behind each product. Shipping is free to the US, $12 to Canada, and $15 for other countries.
Three club levels to choose from for exploring unique and exciting, hand-crafted wines, delivered straight to your door.
GlossyBox is a beauty and makeup subscription. They send out 4-5 deluxe and full size beauty products each month.
Dollar Shave Club is the original razor subscription service. They offers 3 razor options: $1, $6 and $9 a month. They also recently added shave cream and wipes.

Every month, follow our characters Sam and Sofia as they embark on a new country adventure. Your first monthâ€™s Explorer Kit arrives in a suitcase and contains everything your child needs to get started: a letter from Sam and Sofia, a map, a passport, stickers, access to online games and more. Country specific packages filled with fun souvenirs, letters, stickers, photos, activity sheets and more arrive every month thereafter.(Subscription plans available for children 5-12).

Trunk Club is a monthly stylist subscription service for men. They send you a box of 6-8 items, including shirts, pants, accessories, and shoes. Only pay for what you keep, and work out your budget preferences with your stylist. Prices start at $40 for t-shirts.

Bestowed is a monthly health subscription box - every month they send you healthy food and the occasional lifestyle product selected by celebrity Nutritionist Heather Bauer. (Get one month free with an annual subscription).

company: Vegan Cuts Snacks and Beauty Box
description: The Vegan Cuts Beauty Box delivers cruelty-free beauty products to your doorstep once per month. Each box includes 4-7 products with a value of $35+ total. (Shipping is free to US, $8 to Canada, and $15 Worldwide).

The Honest Company Essentials Bundle includes premium natural, non-toxic personal care & home cleaning essentials. Choose 5 items from their collection each month. The subscription is $34.95 each month plus $5.95 shipping.

Enjoy the convenience of a monthly shipment of 6 jumbo bags of our Honest Diapers â€” eco-friendly, ultra absorbent & free of lotions, fragrances & latex. Also included are 4 packages of our Honest Wipes â€” all natural, soothing, super thick, "Cheek to Cheek"â„¢ versatility (these wipes can do it all).
Enjoy the convenience of our whole-food based & ultra-pure vitamins & supplements. Select 2 vitamins and mix and match each month. Just what you need for a happy, healthy family!

The GREENBOX from Homegrown Collective is a subscription box that is part eco-friendly, part DIY. Each month they send you everything you need to complete multiple projects around a theme. The month-to-month box costs $39 plus $9 shipping. If you subscribe to the 6-month plan shipping is free! (Shipping to Canada is $19 a month)
Bombfell is a men's monthly clothing stylist subscription service. Every item they send has been handpicked for you by a stylist based on your preferences and sizes.

Each month, discover 10-20 products right at your doorstep. From snacks to household products to beauty essentials and more, every box makes it easy to experience the purest, most ethical, natural, and organic products on the planet.

Each month, discover 10-20 vegan products right at your doorstep. From snacks to household products to beauty essentials and more, every box makes it easy to experience the purest, most ethical, natural, and organic products on the planet.

Each month, discover 10-20 gluten-free products right at your doorstep. From snacks to household products to beauty essentials and more, every box makes it easy to experience the purest, most ethical, natural, and organic products on the planet.

The Gourmet Trunk features new items each month from the best gourmet lifestyle brands. Each trunk includes 5-10 products, discount coupons, backgrounds on the companies and amazing recipe ideas. Boxes are $29 plus $5.99 shipping.

The Sweet Trunk features new items each month from amazing hand-picked brands. We promise you won't be disappointed. Each trunk includes 5-10 products, discount coupons, backgrounds on the companies and amazing recipe ideas.

The Health Trunk features new items each month from our favorite healthy living brands. Discover what's out there! Each trunk includes 5-10 products, discount coupons, backgrounds on the companies and amazing recipe ideas.

The BBQ Trunk features new items each month from the best hand-picked brands. Start grilling like a pro. Each trunk includes 5-10 products, discount coupons, backgrounds on the companies and amazing recipe ideas.

Each month, you will receive a full, 30-day supply of one, two, or three products of Skincare, Hair Care, or Color Cosmetics. Every product that you receive is a luxury product, not yet available on the US market, with a projected retail value of $40-$200. These products often have patented ingredients, are manufactured in Europe by the top labs, and are more innovative than whatâ€™s available on the US market today. Subscriptions are $29.95 a month plus $5.95 shipping to US subscribers. ($10.95 to Canada)

New Beauty Test Tube is a beauty and makeup subscription service. Every two months they send you deluxe and full size skincare, haircare, and makeup products. The boxes are $29.95 a month plus $8.95 shipping.

The Hunt Club is a men's clothing subscription service from Frank & Oak. Prices per piece of clothing start at $20. Each month you will get 5 items shipped to you for free, return the items you don't want (for free) and only pay for what you keep.
With a Treatsie subscription you get a curated sample boxes of artisan candy from ever changing confectioners for $15 a month plus $4.95 shipping.

Join the Sock of the Month ClubÂ© and weâ€™ll grace your mailbox with a fun pair of Ozone socks at the beginning of every month. Over a 12 month period, youâ€™ll get 10 pairs of socks, two knee-highs and one over the knee (Guys, you will get 13 pairs of our awesome crew socks.). Thatâ€™s $250 worth of socks, but youâ€™ll only pay $150 to become a member - and youâ€™ll get 13 pairs total! FYI - The Sock of the Month Club is $150 upfront.

FabKids is a kids clothing subscription for boys and girls in sizes 2 through 12. Each month you'll find new outfits styled just for your kid. Every outfit includes 3 pieces for just $39.95. You can buy the outfit you love or skip the month altogether.

Co-founded by Kate Hudson, Fabletics is a monthly workout clothing subscription service. Every month they curate workout looks for you based on your style and exercise preferences. Complete Looks for VIP Members start at $49.95, a savings of up to 40%. You can buy the Looks you love or skip the month altogether.

Bluum is a monthly baby and toddler subscription box. Bluum customizes every box to your child's age in month. The boxes include full size items for your child, and usually an item or two for mom as well.
Incredibundles offers three different 1-year subscriptions for babies and toddlers: A year of books, A year of toys and A year of diapers. The bundles ship in installments four times a year.
Green Kid Crafts sends out monthly craft kits for children that build creativity, boost confidence and teach about nature. (Shipping to US is free, additional $8 to Canada).

The Happy Trunk boxes come in two different age groups. The 3-7 year boxes are themed activity boxes with art, craft and science activities. Each box has all materials and know how to complete 2-3 projects inspiring creativity and exploration. The Happy Trunk boxes for 7-11 year age group are designed differently. These boxes do not follow a particular theme. Each box comes with 2 projects, one more geared towards arts & crafts, and one towards scientific exploration. All materials and know how included. (Shipping is free to the US, an additional $9.95 per box to Canada).

Every month Escape Monthly lets you experience incredible destinations â€“ from Tahiti to Rome and from Sicily to Barcelona. Inside, we pack incredible foods, relaxation tips and secrets, and the highest quality products focused on pampering oneself. Each box contains an assortment of deluxe items, plus completely unique content inspired by each destination.
Batch Nashville is a monthly subscription box that only sends locally-made goods. Every month they send you delicious goodies straight from Nashville!
Graze is a monthly snack subscription service. You get to select which snacks you want and the delivery schedule. (Available every week, every two weeks, or every four weeks).
Subscribe to a tour around the world and receive a gourmet box from a different city every 60 days, delivered to your door.

Siobhan and Alexandra spotlight the best clean products, reawakening a tradition of self-care and showing that organic ingredients are all you need. Shipping is free to the US. (Canada +$10; rest of world +$15.)
We love the romance of analog, but we're also big-time gadget nerds here at Quarterly. Enjoy our latest and greatest tech picks. Shipping is free to the US. (Canada +$20; rest of world +$30)

Nina is an award-winning author, "Project Runway" judge, and the Creative Director of [Marie Claire]. She sends her favorite fashion finds, plus other cultural gems. Shipping is free to the US. (Canada +$30; rest of world +$40)

The BlackSocks Sockscription offers various Menâ€™s dress socks â€“ pick out the pair you like and get the sockscription for that pair. Prices start at $89 for 3 deliveries of 3 pairs over the course of a year.
Loot Crate is monthly subscription â€œfor geeks and gamers.â€ Each month they send you collectibles, stickers, (sometimes t-shirts) and other fun items. The box costs $13.37 plus $6 shipping a month

Phone Case of the Month is a new monthly iPhone case subscription service. Each month they make only 200 of a limited edition case for their subscribers! Shipping is free to the US, and an additional $5 for international subscribers.
Each box will contain items that Bill finds to be fascinating that will spark discovery. Shipping is free to the US. (Canada +$30; rest of world +$40)
Five Four Club is a monthly clothing subscription box for men. Each month they send you 2-3 pieces based on your style profile and measurements.

From Andrew on what you can expect in his Quarterly Box: "I love food. What I love even more is food with a story. Through my journeys on Bizarre Foods, I've experienced a wide range of rich cultures, foods, and culinary techniques. I'm thrilled to share those stories and flavors from the road with you. I'm obsessed with technology (gotta stay in touch with Mrs. Z and my son while I'm out of town!), so expect some apps, gadgets and tools that make living out of a suitcase easier. And since I am such a huge pop culture geek and a kid at heart, there's bound to be a few weird odds and ends thrown in, just for fun." Shipping is free to the US. (Canada +$30; rest of world +$40)

Every Fantasy Box will contain products directly related to the fantasy you're going to be playing out. The products are high-quality, full-sized, carefully selected, and vetted. They will include everything from lingerie and toys, to novelties and everyday items you may have never expected. There are three different subscription options: The Fantasy Box: Essentials ($34), The Fantasy Box ($59), and The Fantasy Box Platinum ($159).
Unbound is an adult quarterly subscription. Each box is a collection of 5-7 products devoted to a provocative theme.

There are two different subscription options: The original box ($39.95) which includes 3 fashion accessory items and 4 beauty items, and the Boxette version ($24.95), which includes 2 fashion items and 2 beauty items

The Craft Beer Club discovers exceptional craft brews from around the country and delivers them each month direct-to-you or your gift recipient. Every selection is produced by small-production, independent brewers who use only traditional brewing ingredients and time-honored brewing methods.

Plonk Wine Club is a monthly wine subscription box. You can select 2 bottles of red, white or mixed for $49.99, or 4 bottles for $89.99. Plonk Wine Club offers an eclectic international selection of organic, biodynamic, and limited-production wines made by the world's best boutique wineries. Gift options are available as well.

Pijon box is a college care package subscription box. They offer options for both male and female college students. Every box includes 5-6 products in the following categories: food and snacks, health and beauty, essentials, and awesome accessories and gadgets.

Cellars Wine Club offers 6 different wine subscription options - all with gift options. They have international wines, west coast wines, and other selections. (FYI - Cellars Wine Club does not ship to AK, ND, HI, MA, ME, NH, TX, and UT).

The Gold Medal Wine Club subscription sources their starter subscription program from small California wineries. They also have 4 other options for International and top-rated wines. (From what I can tell, there are no state shipping restrictions on this subscription). Wine club packages start at $35 a month.
Darby Girl is a bi-monthly craft and DIY subscription box for tweens. Each box will include: all the craft supplies you need, step-by-step instructions and inspirational project photos.
Poop Bag Club is a monthly subscription box for dog owners. They offer eco-friendly and compostable bags.
Beauty Box 5 is one of the most inexpensive beauty and makeup subscription boxes. It's $10 a month for a 3-month subscription, or $8.25 a month with an annual subscription.
Pash Pack is a monthly adult subscription box. They offer subscriptions for Men, Women and Men & Women.

Total Beauty Collection is not a typical subscription - each month they release new collections, and you can purchase them individually. Collections usually include a mix of full size and sample size products, and range from drugstore products to high-end brands.
Cate & Chloe VIP is a monthly jewelry subscription. Each month you get $200 worth of Cate & Chloe jewelry. (2 pieces shipped separately throughout the month).
MemeBox is a monthly one-time purchase box that features beauty products from Korea.
Bianca Jade is a leading fitness and fashion expert, and the founder of MizzFIT.com. She sends edgy and innovative wellness items. Her boxes guide you to radiant style and a strong life.
Geeky gear for kids ages 6-11. (This subscription is only toys â€“ no t-shirt like the regular Nerd Block subscription). The box is $13.99 and shipping varies based on country. Ships worldwide.
Geeky gear for kids ages 6-11. (This subscription is only toys â€“ no t-shirt like the regular Nerd Block subscription). The box is $13.99 and shipping varies based on country. Ships worldwide.
Good Mouth is a monthly toothbrush subscription service that gives back. For every toothbrush subscription sold, they donate two toothbrushes to charity.
Each Lip Monthly box includes 2-3 full size lip products and 2-3 samples. (Shipping outside of the US is an additional $5).

UrthBox is a monthly healthy and natural snack subscription service. They offer a classic subscription, or you can specify gluten-free or vegan. Each box includes 12-15 Full Size Products. The cost is $25 a month, or $19 a month with a 6-month plan. (Shipping is free to the US, $6 to Canada).
Monthly Express is a new high-end womenâ€™s luxury subscription service.
Pet Box is a monthly subscription box for dogs and cats. Each month you can select toys, treats, grooming items you want in your box (typically 5-6 items), or be surprised.

Soxiety is an annual sock subscription for men or women. It's $120 a year for US subscribers. After registering to Soxiety, you can access the dedicated SOXSCRIBE PAGE , where youâ€™ll find a few questions regarding your preferred sock sizes, lengths and styles. They two main kinds of SOXscribe services: Pick Your Own Pairs, for those who know exactly what they need and want, or Soxiety Surprise â€“ which will furnish you with a perfect mix of smooth, ribbed and colored variations, specially selected by our own sock stylists. The first order will be sent as soon as the SOXscribe is confirmed; the three successive orders will be sent out on fixed dates, generally at the start of each new season. Each SOXscribe order will contain at least one â€œdebutâ€ pair that will go online only after the SOXscribe have been shipped, ensuring that our subscribers always have the best of the season before anyone else.

Peekapak is a monthly craft and creativity subscription box for kids. Inside your monthly Peekapak, you will find: A new learning and creating adventure, designed with experienced education advisors. An exciting storybook filled with educational tidbits, interesting challenges, and craft instructions. Our storybooks are designed to promote play and inquiry-based learning. 2 or 3 substantial crafts that are sure to wow. All the materials needed for the activities. With an annual subscription the cost is only $19.99 a month. (Free shipping to the US and Canada).

PrettyFit provides active women with nutritional supplements, healthy snacks, workout gear and more through monthly packs chosen by top fitness professionals. Expert trainers include their best workouts, recipes, and tips to maximize the benefit of the products inside every pack. Skip any month you aren't interested in.
Each SporkPack includes 6-8 items, retailing at $40+. Each month includes a kitchen gadget and/or cooking essential along with various treats.
The Vegan Cuts Dog Lovers Box includes 11 items with a retail value of $44. Shipping is extra for Canada and International.
The Vegan Cuts Family Starter Kit is filled with 12 vegan and cruelty-free products for babies, toddlers, and moms, valuing $47. Shipping is extra to Canada and International.
Every month, Le Parcel sends you period products, plus chocolate and a gift (past gifts have been cosmetic and skin care samples, chapstick, jewelry, and watches).
Horror Block is a new box from Nerd Block. Each month you will receive a horror themed t-shirt, plus toys and collectibles. Ships worldwide.

truBrain is a monthly supplement subscription box truBrainâ€™s goal is to give you the competitive edge of focused cognitive performance as an everyday alternative to over-reliance on caffeine and energy drinks. Shipping is free to the US, $10 to Canada, and $20 Worldwide.
Every month, receive a box of materials to do hands-on projects for kids ages 6-11. Boxes cover a surprise theme ranging from art and science to food and geography.
Batch Memphis is a monthly local subscription box. Every Batch includes details about that month's contents so you get to know who made the goods you're enjoying and where to find more.
Batch Charleston is a monthly local subscription box. Every Batch includes details about that month's contents so you get to know who made the goods you're enjoying and where to find more.
RC Subscription Box is a new monthly subscription box from HobbyTron that sends you a new Remote Controlled Helicopter, Car, Truck etc. each month, $60 worth of remote control items in each box.
This is the gluten-free version of the regular Love With Food subscription. Get 8-12 gluten-free snacks that are also all natural or organic every month.

The Prize Candle Club is a monthly jewelry surprise candle subscription â€“ every month you get a new featured scent candle, and once it burns down for several hours it will reveal a ring worth anywhere from $10 to $5000. The first candle in a subscription is $14.99.

Timothy Ferriss wrote the #1 national bestseller The 4-Hour Chef. The theme of his Quarterly mailings is obsessionâ€”the ideas and objects he can't get out of his head. Shipping is free to the US, $30 to Canada, and $40 Worldwide.

Best known for his work with the Neptunes and N.E.R.D., Pharrell Williams is a creative force, using music, fashion and design to express his distinctive style. The theme of his mailings is curiosity. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Amanda and Merrill worked together on the bestselling The Essential New York Times Cookbook and run FOOD52, the first crowd-curated food community. They'll send you packages filled with nifty items for your kitchen and table. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Lewis Hilsenteger is the founder of Unbox Therapy and an online media aficionado. He sends his picks from the world of tech and tech culture. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Unclutterer is inspired when there is a place for everything and everything is in its place. Their mailings contain useful and aesthetically pleasing organizing and productivity solutions. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Mark Frauenfelder is the founding editor-in-chief of MAKE magazine, and the founder of Boing Boing. His mailings feature small objects that delight the senses and tools that make everyday actions fun. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

company: Hitha On The Go Quarterly Box
description: A recovering overpacker and seasoned world traveler, Hitha teaches women how to travel in style with only a carry-on. Each box features must-pack items and a guide to a packing problem area. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Arianna Huffington is the editor-in-chief of the Huffington Post Media Group and author of fourteen books. She sends items that help her take her mother's advice: "Don't Miss the Moment." Shipping is free to the US, $30 to Canada, and $40 Worldwide.

GQ has been providing definitive coverage of style and culture for more than 50 years. For Quarterly, they'll be sending essential grooming and styling products for the modern man. Shipping is free to the US, $30 to Canada, and $40 Worldwide.

Q-Tip first rose to prominence as one of the founders of the trailblazing hip-hop group A Tribe Called Quest. His boxes will share his genuine love for music, art and culture. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Le Tote is a monthly styling and clothing rental service. Fill out your profile, subscribe, and 3 garments plus 2 accessories will delivered to your door. Additionally, subscribers have the option to purchase the items they try: the cost is $50 for dresses, $30 for separates, $20 for necklaces and bracelets, and $10 for other accessories.
Send Me Gluten Free is a monthly gluten-free food and snack subscription box. Each month they send you 8-12 Gluten Free products.

Each month through our Groovy Lab in a Box subscription service, young STEMists (your children!) will receive fun, hands-on projects and an engineering design challenge â€“ all focused on that monthâ€™s STEM topic. All STEMists will receive a Lab Notebook, where they can read about that monthâ€™s topic, perform investigation activities and document their findings. They will investigate, brainstorm, plan, build, test and redesign their own creations. STEMists also receive access to our special â€œBeyondâ€¦in a Boxâ€ online learning portal. This is a unique feature of Groovy Lab in a Box because it gives STEMists a deeper understanding of that monthâ€™s topic. â€œBeyondâ€¦in a Boxâ€ has videos and more interactive activities to supplement what they are learning from the box projects, which also helps the STEMist even more when completing the design challenge.

Rosario Dawson is an acclaimed actor and social activist. Her Quarterly boxes take a cue from her favorite quote: "The journey is the destination." Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

Pley is a monthly lego kit rental service. Starting at $15 a month, you can pick out lego sets (all sanitized) and send them back whenever you are ready for a new set. Plans start at $15 for a small set, $25 for a medium, and $39 for a large set.
The Quarterly team is constantly discovering new toys and collectibles from around the world. Now itâ€™s our turn to send you the characters we've fallen in love with!
Arcade Block is full of gamer gear, collectibles, etc, plus a new t-shirt each month.

Members choose accessories and clutches that they would like to receive. Within 2 shipping days, they receive their first clutch and four accessories. Members can wear the pieces from their Formio box as long as they wish; when they're ready for more, members can purchase accessories they'd like to keep and send back the rest. Within 2 shipping days, members receive their next Formio box of four accessories and clutch.
Candy Club is a candy subscription box that sends up to 3 pounds of candy to you: a mix of classic favorites to new, trendy treats. Save $10 a month with an annual subscription.

Each period cycle, Swaag Box sends you necessary supplies as well as jewelry and makeup. Choose from name brand tampons and pads, tell them your skin type and fashion type and they'll customize your jewelry and makeup. They also offer options to add to your box: choose Venus razor blade refill cartridges and/or double the jewelry and makeup each month.
PawPack a monthly subscription box featuring Organic, All-natural, or Eco-friendly items for your cat or dog.

Nadine West is a monthly styling service. Each month, they send you 2-4 items, usually a single top and matching jewelry, each in the ~$20 range. Keep what you love and send the rest back. There's no cost to receive your box - you only pay for the items you keep.

Melissa Joulwan is the author of two best-selling Paleo cookbooks and a healthy lifestyle blog called The ClothesMakeTheGirl.com. The theme of her boxes is eating clean, training hard, and living loud. Shipping is free to the US, $20 to Canada, and $30 Worldwide.

The Wantable Intimates subscription sends you 4-5 premium essentials based on your preferences. Think undies, bras, tights, leggings, shapewear, socks, etc. Pick which items and styles you want to customize the box each month. Shipping is free to the US. Canada: $6.00 USD United Kingdom: $7.00 USD Australia: $10.00 USD
